modName: Mystical Cleric Robe - Psiijic Robe Retexture
summary: A retexture of the Psiijic Robe to give a mystical and holy look.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod ever, so please give me some constructive criticism and suggestions if you can :)

I actually used zackdip\'s retexture as my base, and added on/modified it. Check out his mod for more awesome retexures 
http://http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1854

I originally made this mod for my Cleric character and it turned out better than I expected, so I thought why not share it? In case you\'re wondering, the purple glow is NOT part of the mod, it just me casting lightning cloak because it looks cool. :) The design on the back is the restoration symbol from Oblivion, since the one from Skyrim is just way too boring. So far this only includes the male version, but I can do the female if anyone requests it. Also, I will try to make a standalone version, but I have yet to figure out how that is done. I assume it won\'t be too hard?
Please endorse if you like it! 

Update
-New standalone version added, credits to jmike00 

-Installation-
This is just a basic texture mod, so use the Mod Manager, or just place the folder in your data folder.

-Uninstallation-
This mod use these files:

psiijicrobes.dds
psiijicgloves.dds
psiijicboots.dds

They\'re locate in Data/textures/clothing/psiijic so just delete these files.

These robes are only obtainable through the console commands, so just input this:

Robe: player.additem 00065B94 1
Hood: player.additem 00065B99 1
Boots: player.additem 00065B9B 1
Gloves: player.additem 00065B9D 1
author: Ting
